attributes.action: Lower car insurance for new young drivers 17-25
attributes.additional_details:
The government have decided that they want the vote from the new and upcoming youth generation. Well what can they do for us?
I have just turned 18 and still am receiving ridiculous prices for car insurance which are completely unjustified. If your in a similiar situation and want something to change then lets pose this problem to our government and see how they can solve it.
Why should we help them by voting if they are unwilling to help us?
